verses.roman:
sei bhaye rātri-śeṣe calilā śrī-purī
sei-khāne gopīnāthe daṇḍavat kari'

synonyms: sei bhaye—fearing that; rātri-śeṣe—at the end of the night; calilā—left; śrī-purī—Śrī Mādhavendra Purī; sei-khāne—on that spot; gopīnāthe—to Lord Gopīnātha; daṇḍavat—obeisances; kari'-doing.
translation: Thinking this, Śrī Mādhavendra Purī offered his obeisances to Gopīnātha on the spot and left Remuṇā before morning.
